genre_description: A maritime romantic thriller involving murder conspiracies, corrupt law enforcement, and antiquities smuggling.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated smartphone-based AI used by Tim Whalen for archaeological analysis and provenance investigation.

behaviors.description: Analyzes hieroglyphic inscriptions and artistic styles to provide instant historical and contextual information.
behaviors.quote: Tim positioned his phone’s camera to capture the relief’s details, letting the AI analyze the hieroglyphic inscriptions and artistic style. Within moments, text began flowing across his screen in neat, precise lines.

behaviors.description: Detects forgeries and identifies stolen artifacts by cross-referencing global auction records and museum databases.
behaviors.quote: Tim's AI assistant peeling back layers of false provenance and forged documentation with digital precision.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is depicted as a highly beneficial and perfectly aligned tool. It assists the protagonist in uncovering objective truths about a criminal legacy, facilitating justice and the protection of historical heritage. While it is a non-agentic assistant rather than a primary character, its helpful and harmless nature supports the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
